AlbumValidationErrors.DuplicateArtist: The same artist cannot be added twice. Please remove the duplicate and edit the roles accordingly.
AlbumValidationErrors.NeedArtist: Album needs at least one artist.
AlbumValidationErrors.NeedReferences: Album needs a description or links for reference.
AlbumValidationErrors.NeedReleaseYear: Release year needs to be specified.
AlbumValidationErrors.NeedType: Record type needs to be specified.

ArtistValidationErrors.NeedReferences: Artist needs a description OR at least one external link as a reference.
ArtistValidationErrors.NeedType: Artist type needs to be specified.
ArtistValidationErrors.UnnecessaryPName: There is no need to add artist name both with and without the P suffix.

SongValidationErrors.DuplicateArtist: The same artist cannot be added twice. Please remove the duplicate and edit the roles accordingly.
SongValidationErrors.NeedOriginal: 除原创曲以外其他类型的歌曲需要注明原版。
SongValidationErrors.NeedProducer: 缺少歌曲制作人信息。（至少一名作曲，编曲或视频制作人）
SongValidationErrors.NeedReferences: Songs needs notes, PVs or links for reference.
SongValidationErrors.NeedType: Song type needs to be specified.
SongValidationErrors.NonInstrumentalSongNeedsVocalists: 缺少歌手信息。如果这首歌曲是原创的纯音乐曲目，请在标签区里添加“Instrumental”标签。如果是伴奏，请将其归为“纯音乐”一类并注明原版。非纯音乐的歌曲必须有至少一名歌手。
SongValidationErrors.RedundantEvent: The same release event does not need to be specified for both the song and album.
SongValidationErrors.RedundantRoles: Producer's roles do not need to be specified when that producer is the only one.
